title: Set numeric value with animation using NumericAnimatedLabel
author: javalnanda
content: readme.md numericanimatedlabelexample run example project, clone repo, run pod install the example directory .requirementsinstallationnumericanimatedlabel is available through cocoapods. install, simply add following line your podfile:pod "numericanimatedlabel"setup only thing need do is import numericanimatedlabel, add uiview storyboard create outlet it.import numericanimatedlabel @iboutlet weak var numericlabel: numericanimatedlabel!override func viewdidload() { super.viewdidload() // set value numericlabel.setvalue(v: walletbalance) // customize required numericlabel.textalignment = .center numericlabel.formatstring = "%.2f" numericlabel.textfont = uifont.boldsystemfont(ofsize: 20.0) // text color be changed storyboard inspector programmatically . }suggestions feedback?feel free create pull request, open issue find on twitter.authorjavalnanda, javalnanda@gmail.comlicensenumericanimatedlabel is available under mit license. the license file more info.
